skyux_tile_expand._description: Label for the expand-and-collapse button in the tile

skyux_tile_expand_default._description: Default label for the expand-and-collapse button in the tile

skyux_tile_help._description: Label for the help button in the tile

skyux_tile_help_default._description: Default label for the help button in the tile

skyux_tile_settings._description: Label for the settings button in the tile

skyux_tile_settings_default._description: Default label for the settings button in the tile

skyux_tile_move._description: Label for move button in the tile

skyux_tile_move_default._description: Default label for move button in the tile

skyux_tile_move_instructions._description: Long description for the move button in the tile
skyux_tile_move_instructions.message: When focus is placed on a tile's move button, use the arrow keys to move it. The up and down keys change its position within a column. The left and right keys move it between columns.

skyux_tile_moved_assistive_text._description: Report of the new location of a recently moved tile
skyux_tile_moved_assistive_text.message: {0} moved. Current column: {1} of {2}. Current position in column: {3} of {4}
